Name: Nut Cheese Press (PH)
Description: This machine turns dairy-free nut milk into equally dairy-free cheese.

DescriptionLocalization.es: This machine turns dairy-free nut milk into equally dairy-free cheese.
DescriptionLocalization.ko: This machine turns dairy-free nut milk into equally dairy-free cheese.
DescriptionLocalization.de: Diese Maschine stellt aus milchfreier Nussmilch ebenso milchfreien Käse her.
DescriptionLocalization.fr: This machine turns dairy-free nut milk into equally dairy-free cheese.
DescriptionLocalization.hu: This machine turns dairy-free nut milk into equally dairy-free cheese.
DescriptionLocalization.it: This machine turns dairy-free nut milk into equally dairy-free cheese.
DescriptionLocalization.ja: This machine turns dairy-free nut milk into equally dairy-free cheese.
DescriptionLocalization.pt: This machine turns dairy-free nut milk into equally dairy-free cheese.
DescriptionLocalization.ru: Эта машина берет орехи и другие измельчаемые предметы и превращает их в различные товары.
DescriptionLocalization.tr: This machine turns dairy-free nut milk into equally dairy-free cheese.
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 这台机器将不含乳制品的坚果牛奶变成同样不含乳制品的奶酪。
